categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Sergeant Reybn was the commanding officer on an Imperial communications outpost on the planet Vaal.

Stationed on Vaal for several months, he and his crew grew lazy, and preferred to sunbathe instead of writing reports. He was killed shortly after the Battle of Yavin, as Darth Vader entered the outpost with a pack of aggressive hyenax, which ripped him and his crew to pieces.
